section.title: Designate a Specific Traffic Type for a Logical Network with the Manage Networks Window
section.para: Specify the traffic type for the logical network to optimize the network traffic flow.

procedure.title: Specifying Traffic Types for Logical Networks

step.para: Click the Clusters resource tab, and select a cluster from the results list.
Select the Logical Networks tab in the details pane to list the logical networks assigned to the cluster.
Click Manage Networks to open the Manage Networks window.
Click OK to save the changes and close the window.

section.para: You have optimized the network traffic flow by assigning a specific type of traffic to be carried on a specific logical network.

note.para: Logical networks offered by external providers must be used as virtual machine networks; they cannot be assigned special cluster roles such as display or migration.
